Tyrael: We drove them back once. Twice won't be so hard to do. 
Besides, we have the edge. They know we can beat them again, so either 
they'll get scared or careless. Both are fine by me. Besides, if you 
need help, we can just transform the base back and launch an all-out 
offensive. I ay to let them come.

He says so with a predatory grin on his face.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Ok so either you can elevate your base and move your 
forces to my base, or we let them attack your base. You two will 
defend it while I attack the Pred base. What sounds good to you guys?
